import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import GoalIcon from './GoalIcon' import { TextField, Button, makeStyles, Container, CssBaseline, Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ paper: { marginTop: theme.spacing(8), display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center" }, goalBook: { fontWeight: "500", fontFamily: "Ma Shan Zheng", color: "#424242" }, submit: { margin: theme.spacing(2, 0, 2) }, form: { marginTop: theme.spacing(5) } })); const Signup = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', password:'', password2:'' }) return (
Already have an account? Login
); }; export default Signup;
